function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Introduction or reestablishment of new species in urban areas fostering the transmission of vector-borne and zoonotic diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of diseases to urban communities","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to control the spread of vector-borne and zoonotic diseases through targeted biological control and surveillance","Technologies":"Biological control methods, surveillance systems","People":"Urban communities","Owner":"Public health authorities and local governments"},{"Description":"Designing water features in a way that limits mosquito breeding and algal growth, but increases the danger for children and pets","Impact":"Increased danger for children and pets around water features","Mitigation":"Implementing safety measures such as barriers and signage to warn of potential hazards","Technologies":"Safety barriers, signage","People":"Children, pet owners","Owner":"Urban planners and designers"},{"Description":"Maintaining undisturbed vegetation around a pond providing habitat for rats and other rodents","Impact":"Increased risk of rodent presence near urban areas","Mitigation":"Implementing rodent control measures such as traps and vegetation management","Technologies":"Rodent traps, vegetation management strategies","People":"Urban communities","Owner":"Local governments and property managers"}]}
